title: LOAD_WATER_FROM_PATH
content:
0xF5102568// LoadWaterFromPath
BOOL LOAD_WATER_FROM_PATH(char* resourceName, char* fileName);Parameters:resourceName: The name of the resource containing your modified water definitionfileName: The name of the fileReturns: Returns true on success.Define the xml in a resources fxmanifest, under the file(s) section.Examples:Lualocal success = LoadWaterFromPath('my-resource-name', 'water-all-over-the-place.xml')
codeBlocks:
// LoadWaterFromPath
BOOL LOAD_WATER_FROM_PATH(char* resourceName, char* fileName);
